mapper.select: SELECT id, password, username, email, phone, roles, status from t_account WHERE username = #{usernameOrEmail} or email = #{usernameOrEmail} AND deleted = 0
SELECT a.id,a.username,a.email,a.phone,a.roles,a.status, p.avatar,p.nickname,p.intro,p.birthday,p.sex FROM (SELECT * FROM t_account_profile WHERE `id` = #{id} ) p, t_account a WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id,a.username,a.email,a.phone,a.roles,a.status, p.avatar,p.nickname,p.intro,p.birthday,p.sex FROM t_account a LEFT JOIN t_account_profile p ON a.id = p.id WHERE a.id in
#{id}

SELECT a.id,a.username,a.email,a.phone,a.roles,a.status, p.avatar,p.nickname,p.intro,p.birthday,p.sex FROM t_account a LEFT JOIN t_account_profile p ON a.id = p.id WHERE a.username = #{usernameOrEmail} or a.email = #{usernameOrEmail}

SELECT a.id,a.username,a.email,a.phone,a.roles,a.status,a.created, p.avatar,p.nickname,p.intro,p.birthday FROM t_account a LEFT JOIN t_account_profile p ON a.id = p.id LEFT JOIN t_account_role ar ON a.id = ar.account_id WHERE a.deleted = 0 AND ar.level >= #{maxLevel}
AND a.username like concat('%', #{username}, '%')
AND p.nickname like concat('%', #{nickname}, '%')
ORDER BY id DESC
